pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sale Shipment Cost Module#########################The sale_shipment_cost module adds shipment cost for sale.Two new fields are added to *Sale* and *Sale Configuration*:- *Carrier*: The carrier used for the sale.- *Shipment Cost Method*: The method used to compute the cost. - *On Order*: The cost will be invoiced once for the sale. - *On Shipment*: The cost will be invoiced for each shipments. - *None*: The cost will not be invoiced to the customer but added to the outgoing moves cost.At the quotation if a carrier is selected a new line is appended with theshipment cost but the added line can be modified when going back to draft.
